title: Punjab and Sind Bank Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Physiotherapist Posts
description: The Punjab and Sind Bank has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Physiotherapist Posts. Interseted and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, and M.E./M. Tech can apply for the Punjab and Sind Bank Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode.
